blocks.name: ismrer1
blocks.content: An isometry between ` RR ` and ` RR ^ 1 ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

} = {

blocks.name: reheibor
blocks.content: Heine-Borel theorem for real numbers. A subset of ` RR ` is compact iff it is closed and bounded. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm reheibor(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, cr), wb(wcel(c1, ccmp), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cbnd, c0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c0, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
} = {
  3bitr4d(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, ccmp), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cbnd, c0))), wcel(cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(crrn, c1o), cxp(cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0)))), ccmp), wa(wcel(cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), cfv(ccld, cfv(cmopn, cfv(crrn, c1o)))), wcel(cres(cfv(crrn, c1o), cxp(cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0))), cfv(cbnd, cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0)))))
  sylancr(wss(c0, cr), wb(wcel(cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(crrn, c1o), cxp(cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0)))), ccmp), wa(wcel(cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), cfv(ccld, cfv(cmopn, cfv(crrn, c1o)))), wcel(cres(cfv(crrn, c1o), cxp(cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0))), cfv(cbnd, cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0))))), wcel(c1o, cfn), wss(cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), co(cr, cmap, c1o)))
  rrnheibor(c1o, cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), co(cr, cmap, c1o), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(crrn, c1o), cxp(cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0)))), cfv(cmopn, cfv(crrn, c1o)), cres(cfv(crrn, c1o), cxp(cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0), cima(cmpt(hs0, cr, cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(cv(hs0)))), c0))))

blocks.name: iccbnd
blocks.content: A closed interval in ` RR ` is bounded. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cfv(cbnd, c3)))

  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, ccmp))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c3, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c4))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, ccmp), wcel(c3, cfv(ccld, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))), wcel(c4, cfv(cbnd, c3)))
  syl5eqel(c3, cfv(ccld, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), co(c0, cicc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  icccld(c0, c1)
  iccbnd(c0, c1, c4, c3)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wcel(c2, ccmp), wa(wcel(c3, cfv(ccld, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))), wcel(c4, cfv(cbnd, c3)))), wss(c3, cr))
  syl5eqss(c3, cr, co(c0, cicc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  iccssre(c0, c1)
  reheibor(c3, c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), c4)
  eqid(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
}

thm icccmpALT(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)→ c2 ∈ Comp)
  ⊣ c3 =(c0[[,]]c1)
  ⊣ c4 =((abs ∘ -)|`(c3 × c3))
  ⊣ c2 =(MetOpen ` c4)
} = {
  mpbir2and((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), c2 ∈ Comp, c3 ∈(Clsd `(topGen ` ran((,)))), c4 ∈(Bnd ` c3))
  syl5eqel(c3, (Clsd `(topGen ` ran((,)))), (c0[[,]]c1), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ))
  icccld(c0, c1)
  iccbnd(c0, c1, c4, c3)
  syl((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), (c2 ∈ Comp ↔(c3 ∈(Clsd `(topGen ` ran((,))))∧ c4 ∈(Bnd ` c3))), c3 ⊆ ℝ)
  syl5eqss(c3, cr, (c0[[,]]c1), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ))
  iccssre(c0, c1)
  reheibor(c3, c2, (topGen ` ran((,))), c4)
  eqid((topGen ` ran((,))))
}
